pr_title: NXP-28921: check for null and undefined on search docs properties

timeline.bodyText:
The comparison can be simply v == null or v == undefined.
When using == and not the strict comparison ===, it checks both null and undefined.
We could also merge the both ifs.
Nice catch! 👍
timeline.author: nmpcunha
